channel.title: CentOS 8 on Where DFIR Meets IT
channel.description: Recent content in CentOS 8 on Where DFIR Meets IT

item.title: Exploiting Yum and DNF Plugins for Persistence
item.description: Two Metasploit Framework modules have held my interest in the last few weeks: the ones for persistence using Linux package managers apt and Yum. While they require root privileges to exploit, they provide a novel persistence mechanism that is likely overlooked by defenders. While looking at these modules I noticed that persistence using DNF wasn’t included, and I set off to find a way to persist on Linux systems using DNF plugins.
